News and developments from Justia and the tech world -----
December 2021

Welcome to the December 2021 Edition 
of the Justia Insights Client Newsletter!

Stay informed with the newsletter designed to bring insights and updates from our team directly to the Justia Connect community!

In this month’s edition, learn more about how Google indexes information in search results and discover how video marketing can take your legal marketing strategy up a notch in the new year. Catch up on breaking legal and technology news over the past month and take a look at what is going on behind the doors at Justia.

Featured News

As we move into the final months of 2021 and the upcoming holiday season, many lawyers are beginning to look forward to their marketing strategies in 2022 and beyond. Check out this post to learn more about why lawyers should be considering adding video into their marketing plans in the coming year.

From the Desk of Justia

Want instant updates? Justia Connect members can subscribe now.

The Best National Bar Association Directories for Boosting Your Legal Marketing Strategy

As we continue our series on the various legal directories lawyers should have on their radar, we have gathered a list of the best national bar association directories. While membership in these organizations is not required, lawyers will want to carefully consider the potential benefits. Check out this post to learn more.

Justia Portal by the Numbers: Resources for Aspiring Lawyers (And Practicing Lawyers Too!)

The Justia Portal is home to a treasure trove of information that can help aspiring lawyers on their journey to joining the legal profession, as well as actual lawyers in their day-to-day practices. Check out this post to learn more about some of the most popular resources available on our site.

Lawyer Ratings Explained: How Your Lawyer Ratings Are Determined By 4 Well-Known Companies

Some of the lawyer directories most frequently used by consumers also incorporate lawyer ratings. With potential clients seeing these ratings on your profiles, it is important to understand how directories determine what your rating may be.

News & Notes on Google Local Services Ads: November 2021

Does your firm use Google’s Local Services Ads (LSAs) as part of your marketing strategy? Want to stay in the know on the latest news, updates, and reminders about LSAs? This post is for you!

Featured Justia Resources: Drunk Driving (DUI/DWI) Center

Did you know that Justia offers numerous free resources to make the law more accessible and help people better understand the foundations of a variety of legal areas? In this post, you can learn more about the information available in Justia’s Drunk Driving (DUI/DWI) Center.

7 Lawyers Who Became Famous

When people think of lawyers (and people with law degrees), they often think of very serious individuals wearing suits to the courtroom. However, many lawyers go on to follow less traditional careers paths. Some even find fame and fortune along the way! Check out this post for a list of a few famous lawyers (or almost lawyers) turned celebrities.

Did You Know?

Google My Business Is Now Google Business Profile

As part of a move to encourage small businesses to manage their profiles directly through Google Search and Google Maps, Google announced it is rebranding Google My Business to the new Google Business Profile. With this shift key changes are coming, including the retirement of the Google My Business app.

Read More

Inside Justia

Meet Our Team

In Memoriam, Donovan Coronado (1992-2021)

With heavy hearts, the Justia Team shares the news that an invaluable member of the team, Donovan Coronado, passed away last month. Donovan contributed immensely to Justia and our clients over the past 7 years and is remembered for his dedication, creative spirit, and kind nature. His loss is felt by all Justians, and he is missed immensely.

A Pug’s Tale

Welcome, Zoey!

We are excited to introduce Zoey, the newest Hug Pug. At 6 months old, she is playful and eager to explore her surroundings. We are excited to watch her grow and share her adventures with all of you!
